name: The End of Nowhere
storyline:
A Frozen Nightmare

A cold game set in a remote Alaskan town.
Waking up in a freezing Alaskan town, you are forced to survive against creatures that you have never seen before. Balance your scarce resources against the threats that inhabit the town, and find a way to escape this frozen hell.

Timing is Everything

Count your shots.
Reloading your weapons comes at a cost. Holding the "Reload Stance", slowly fixates your camera towards the firearm you are currently using. This allows you to reload and check your ammo... at the cost of averting your eyes away from whatever may be in front of you.
summary: A cold game set in a remote Alaskan town. Waking up in a freezing Alaskan town, you are forced to survive against creatures that you have never seen before. Balance your scarce resources against the threats that inhabit the town, and find a way to escape this frozen hell.
